name: GunRunner
description: GunRunner is a free endless runner arcade game that is very similar to other titles you might have seen but with a little twist: The playable cubes and the oposition are all physics based items. So, they will jump, slide and explode in a dynamic environment. The game is available for PC and mobile. Through the levels you will assume multiple shapes and move forwards in a cube dilemma. There are level categories which also change the color scheme of the game giving a pleasing, bright and active image. Proceed through levels and grow your cube count. Join the developement and let us know what you would like to see added to the game.
